original_text: He had a little book in his hand and it was open. He put his right foot on the sea and he put his left foot on the land.
korean_text: 그 손에는 펴 놓인 작은 두루마리를 들고 그 오른 발은 바다를 밟고 왼 발은 땅을 밟고

sentences.original_text: He had a little book in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 손에 작은 책을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He put his right foot on the sea
and he put his left foot on the land
